WorkItem.Description:
After ticking the diamond to indicate that an items is available for optimization and saving the file, if I close Rawr and reopen it and the character, the ticks are gone.
Â 
These ticks should, in my opinion, be saved with the character to the file for future use.  Also, I could have sworn that in the past, they were indeed saved.

Comments.Message: Hmm... can you try again? Those really are saved on the character, nothing's changed in that regard. If you can identify some way that they don't save, let us know.
